name: Series 896 Cylinder Regulator
description: Two regulators in one touch tough brass body. Only with multi stage regulators are both pressure and flow controlled with extreme accuracy regardless of changing cylinder pressure.All models are suitable for use also with lightweight gasses
First stage (high pressure) reduces shock of full cylinder pressure by approximately 90%
Uses the Harris made capsule P.T.F.E. (Teflon) seat on first stage.This seat is pre-tested and sealed with an internal sintered alloy filter (replacing inlet stem filter),to give extremely long life
Complying with EN ISO-2503 - compressed gas regulators have tamperproof internal safety relief valve (IRV)
Large second stage diaphragm (in satinless steel on 25 bar model) accurrately controls delivery pressure

Knob is adjustable, but cannot be removed from its regulator accidentally.High pressure models (15 and 25 bar) are fitted with large adjusting "T" screw and stainless steel ball for smooth pressure adjustment
Clear identity label has colour, gas name, inlet and maximum outlet pressure
Large (63mm Ø) safety pressure guages with a rear safety conform to EN-562

name: Regulator Model 987 Climatester
description: High Pressure nitrogen regulator for air conditioning / refrigerating equipment test
Inlet connection as per country specification
Body bonnet and adjusting knob in forged brass
Stainless steel diaphragm is designed to retain the full cylinder pressure

name: Model 28 Hand Cutting Torch
description: Inlet connection as per country specification
Body bonnet and adjusting knob in forged brass
Stainless steel diaphragm is designed to retain the full cylinder pressure

name: model 62-5 Industrial Torch
description: Hand cutting low pressure torch for Acetylene
This hand torch is the industrt standard by which all other designs are compared. It is less expensive to own and operate and safer to use
The same torch can be used for cutting and gouging
Spare parts and accessories easily available
World-wide reputation as the best torch
Fuel gas pressure low as 0,15 bar
Low pressure torch for acetylene and hydrogen
Solid forged head and lever resist abuse and distortion
Compact and lightweight triangular tube with exceptional strenght and rigidity
Simply change tip for cutting or gouging

name: Model 730 Single Stage Cylinder Regulator
description: Medium duty cutting, heating and welding
Designed to seal and reduce risk leaks
Enough fuel to cut up to 300mm steel
High pressure capsule seat with PTFE (Teflon®)
"D" versions and self reseating internal safety relief valve (IRV)
Standard version with black  painted bonnet
